questions.question: According to the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN), what is the estimated total population range for the polar bear?

In the context of polar bear reproduction, when does the fertilized embryo typically begin development due to delayed implantation?
options: During the mating season, between March and May
After the mother emerges from the den in early spring
In the fall, between mid-September and mid-October
When the cub is born during winter
questions.correct_answer: In the fall, between mid-September and mid-October

questions.question: In the 1758 edition of his work *Systema Naturae*, how did Carl Linnaeus originally classify the polar bear?
options: As a type of brown bear: Ursus maritimus albus-major, arcticus
As a species separate from all other bears
questions.correct_answer: As a type of brown bear: Ursus maritimus albus-major, arcticus
